io.r2dbc.spi

Class R2dbcNonTransientException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • io.r2dbc.spi.R2dbcException
            • io.r2dbc.spi.R2dbcNonTransientException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    R2dbcBadGrammarException, R2dbcDataIntegrityViolationException, R2dbcNonTransientResourceException, R2dbcPermissionDeniedException

    public abstract class R2dbcNonTransientException
extends R2dbcException
    Base exception thrown when a retry of the same operation would fail unless the cause of the exception is corrected.
    See Also:
    R2dbcBadGrammarException, R2dbcDataIntegrityViolationException, R2dbcPermissionDeniedException, R2dbcNonTransientResourceException, Serialized Form

        sql - the SQL statement that caused this error
